name: Aloft (Jared Slawski)
description:
WARNING!!!  IF YOU WANT TO HAVE YOUR SCORES TRACKED ON THE LEADERBOARDS, YOU MUST DOWNLOAD AND PLAY ON THE WINDOWS BUILD!!!

All things eventually come to an end. Even the joy felt from a child carrying a balloon is not safe from the inevitability of the world. Slowly drifting away into the unkown, we find ourselves Aloft, far out of reach.
